title: Silver banner
body: Hello, I finished the Season S 5 with 0 lp. I played many games and was active. I looked at my account and I do not have a silver banner which is a perk of silver. I am not sure why, can I please get an explanation or get it fixed? Thank you!

replies.body: Only the previous season borders will appear on an account.  Now that Season 6 has finished, borders for that season will appear instead of 5.  Let me knwo if you have any questions.
yes, I understand that. I get Silver in season 6 and I didn't get my border this season for that.
I was silver 5 0 lp I was active
